attributes.action: Open an Afghanistan Enquiry Now , not next year or later
attributes.additional_details: As elected Gov officials , they owe the British people answers and more details of how efficient they were in managing this sad tragedy and how pro active the officials involved have been in managing and reducing the suffering of thousands of people; the British people need answers now , not tomorrow, not a year later and certainly not afterwards..
attributes.background: We demand answers and an unbiased investigation into our Gov actions that contributed to the human catastrophe unraveling in front of our eyes in Afghanistan, and the enquiry be held now and not next year or in six years like all other Gov enquiries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595335
